articles.author: Shane Sanderson shane.sanderson@trib.com
articles.title: Man avoids jail after pointing a rifle at sheriff's deputies
articles.description: A judge sentenced a Natrona County man to five years of probation Wednesday for pointing an AR-15 rifle at sheriff's deputies who were responding to a shots fired call.

articles.author: Shane Sanderson shane.sanderson@trib.com
articles.title: Natrona County men arrested after separate alleged assaults with a pick axe and hammer
articles.description: Two Natrona County men were arrested in the past week on suspicion of aggravated assault in separate incidents involving makeshift weapons.

articles.author: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/home/search.html?s=&authornamef=Iain+Burns+For+Mailonline, By Iain Burns For Mailonline
articles.title: Wyoming transgender woman guilty of sexual assault
articles.description: Michelle Martinez - known as Miguel before identifying as a female - was convicted of first and second degree sexual abuse of a minor at Natrona County District Court in Wyoming.

articles.author: Shane Sanderson shane.sanderson@trib.com
articles.title: Man pleads guilty to burglary charge in Casper arson case, second charge dropped
articles.description: A man accused of breaking into a north Casper home, stealing from it and setting it on fire pleaded guilty to a burglary charge Tuesday in Natrona County District Court.

articles.author: By SHANE SANDERSON Casper Star-Tribune
articles.title: No word on any investigation at Wyoming juvenile jail
articles.description: CASPER, Wyo. (AP) — The agency responsible for investigating Natrona County's Juvenile Detention Center won't say whether it has done so in the wake of allegations a worker there sexually assaulted a female inmate.

articles.description: CASPER, Wyo. (AP) — The agency responsible for investigating Natrona County’s Juvenile Detention Center won’t say whether it has done so in the wake of allegations a worker there sexually assaulted a female inmate. The Wyoming Department of Family Services ov…

articles.author: nicholaslearned
articles.title: Brother Arrested for Throwing Microwaved Burrito At Sister...
articles.description: Casper police on Saturday arrested a 20-year-old man who allegedly threw a hot burrito at his younger sister, resulting in a burn on her left arm. Gage L. Fisher was booked into jail on a recommended charge of assault. He will likely make his initial appearan…

articles.title: Former Wyoming deputy gets probation for drug deal attempt
articles.description: CASPER, Wyo. (AP) — A judge has sentenced a former Wyoming sheriff's deputy to probation for trying to sell a prescription painkiller.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Former Wyoming deputy gets probation for drug deal attempt
articles.description: CASPER, Wyo. (AP) — A judge has sentenced a former Wyoming sheriff’s deputy to probation for trying to sell a prescription painkiller. A jury found Michael Martinez guilty last summer of attempting to deliver oxycodone. Prosecutors say Martinez agreed to sell…

articles.author: Shane Sanderson shane.sanderson@trib.com
articles.title: Deputies take man into custody alleging he shot into Bar Nunn home, striking cat
articles.description: A woman was in bed Saturday morning in her home near Bar Nunn when a man fired into her bedroom and hit a cat she was petting, her husband said Monday morning.

articles.author: wbastone
articles.title: Intoxicated Time Traveler Warned Of Alien Invasion
articles.description: Top contender for 2017 Police Report of the Year <!--paging_filter--> OCTOBER 4--In what seems like a plausible story, a Wyoming man arrested for public intoxication told police that he was a time traveler from the year 2048 who had returned to warn Wyoming T…

articles.author: Shane Sanderson shane.sanderson@trib.com
articles.title: Defendant in painkiller conspiracy case pleads guilty, would avoid prison
articles.description: A Wyoming man pleaded guilty Friday to conspiring to sell painkillers purchased from a former Casper doctor who is now facing federal drug trafficking charges.

articles.title: 'Transgender' guilty of bathroom sex assault of girl, 10
articles.description: A “transgender” is facing up to 70 years in prison after being found guilty of the bathroom sex assault of a Wyoming 10-year-old girl. A 12-person jury last week found Miguel Martinez guilty of first-degree and second-degree sexual abuse of a minor. The girl’…

articles.author: Joshua Rhett Miller
articles.title: Transgender woman convicted of sexually assaulting girl
articles.description: A transgender woman in Wyoming has been convicted of sexually assaulting a 10-year-old girl inside the bathroom of a local home – and now faces up to 70 years in prison. Miguel Martinez — who identifies as a woman and uses the name Michelle, according to her …

articles.author: Shane Sanderson 307-266-0624, shane.sanderson@trib.com
articles.title: Wyoming man pleads not guilty to charges alleging he kidnapped 95-year-old woman
articles.description: A Riverton man pleaded not guilty Thursday to charges alleging he kidnapped a 95-year-old Casper woman and fled from police while driving her car.

articles.title: Could Arizona have stopped a coach from threatening an athlete's life?
articles.description: The pair had been meeting secretly for sex for nearly three years. The coach says it was consensual. The athlete says he was blackmailing and abusing her.
